attributes.action: To make more use of Territorial Army and UK Based Regular Army on the streets of UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel we should make more use of TA and Regular army troops that are uk based to help with the local police force and make high profile patrols with the police. this would help fight crime and increase safty on the streets. also will show the public that the army are supporting locals aswell as just there roles in current deployments. i am not suggesting any official power for the troops but to assist like pcso`s. make use of the resources that are already there.
